subject: X Games
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Daron Rahlves was hooked from behind, someone clinging to his arm just long enough to shear his speed in the finals of men’s skiercross at the Winter X Games.
snippet: Daron Rahlves was hooked from behind, someone clinging to his arm just long enough to shear his speed in the finals of men’s skiercross at the Winter X Games.
